docket_entries.description: Adversary case 2:09-ap-03295. Complaint by HOWARD M EHRENBERG against Softmaster, Inc.. (Charge To Estate). COMPLAINT FOR (1) AVOIDANCE AND RECOVERY OF PREFERENTIAL TRANSFERS, (2) PRESERVATION OF PREFERENTIAL TRANSFERS, AND (3) DISALLOWANCE OF CLAIMS Nature of Suit: (12 (Recovery of money/property - 547 preference)) (Lev, Daniel) (Entered: 12/13/2009)

Summons Service Executed on Softmaster, Inc. 1/15/2010 (Werth, Steven) (Entered: 02/05/2010)
